name: My Furry Detective
storyline: A mysterious crime that nobody could investigate is now on your shoulders. Not only yours, actually, there is also a detective that everybody in agency makes jokes about, she is your partner now. Who knows, maybe she is a good detective?
summary: My Furry Detective is a comedy detective story about motivation, hard work and dreams. Investigate the crime, spend time with your partner, and who knows, maybe you can get along, or even solve the crime together?
